about_the_game:
Aliens have come to The Planet! Help Kitsy Katsy survive the tides of oncoming otherworldly enemies to harvest, recruit, build, upgrade, and craft the way to victory! Hmm? What's that? Was that name picked by a toddler or something? Why yes! Yes it was. Thanks for noticing! And you can expect plenty more exquisitely high-quality content like that to come.

With a bizarre smushing together of two very different genres, Cats vs. Aliens lets you enjoy the cozy game loops of farm sims and base builders alongside the dodge-and-pray combat of bullet heaven roguelites. Create a lovely little home to chill in, then take to the diverse biomes of The Planet to gather rare resources to help help you create a better home to let you gather more resources to help you create a better home, to help you.... you get it.

Gather items while dodging enemies that are flying at you from all directions. Survive long enough to get back to safety and get crafting, baby! Use your gathered resources to craft upgrades for your next excursion, or stockpile them to upgrade your home base.

With combat and levelling inspired by roguelite and survivorslike titles, you can create new builds every time you leave your base.  Grow your powers, expand you collection of upgrades, and find the most game-breaking builds fathomable!

Kitsy Katsy isn't alone! Explore the world to find and recruit the many lovingly crafted playable characters that each bring their own exciting unlockable something or other to the game.  Play as any character you unlock!

Visit a world contrived by the moderately deranged mind of Echo in a Void - you know, that dapper solodeveloper that made this game you're looking at RIGHT MEOW! With hand drawn (and hand-pixelled) artwork by Echo, Cats vs. Aliens offers you a truly unique experience that you won't find anywhere else. At least until the next game. I'll have to change this description at that point.
detailed_description:
Playtest For Cats vs Aliens!

Playtesting phase 2 starts on January 10th!  Click that "Request Access" button right meow so that you can be notified the moment it opens.


About the Game

movies.name: Cats vs Aliens Gameplay Teaser Trailer

name: Cats vs. Aliens
short_description: Aliens have come to The Planet! Fight, gather, build, recruit, and conquer in this casually fresh take on familiar base building and bullet heaven mechanics. WARNING: Animal pun quantity may exceed the daily recommended limit.
